snippet: A judge halted court proceedings Monday for one of two 12-year-old girls accused of trying to kill a classmate to please a fictional character called Slender Man while the girl undergoes a competency evaluation....

headline.print_headline: Judge Halts Proceedings in Child Stabbing Case
headline.main: Judge Halts Proceedings in Child Stabbing Case

lead_paragraph: A judge halted court proceedings Monday for one of two 12-year-old girls accused of trying to kill a classmate to please a fictional character called Slender Man while the girl undergoes a competency evaluation.
